src:
WTA年終賽 謝淑薇晉女雙4強

03 Nov 2019, 09:51

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月03日訊】WTA年終總決賽，台灣好手謝淑薇與捷克搭檔史翠可娃（Barbora Strycova）1日在女雙小組賽，以6：2、4：6、9：11敗給中國徐一幡與加拿大達布洛夫斯基（Gabriela Dabrowski），不過仍以分組第一挺進4強。
謝淑薇與史翠可娃開賽氣勢旺，3：1領先後，盤末再度攻破對手發球局，以6：2先下一城。次盤謝淑薇與史翠可娃遭遇亂流，以4：6讓出次盤。


謝淑薇，圖為資料照。（Matthew Stockman/Getty Images)

第三盤，謝淑薇與史翠可娃一度取得3：0領先，不過對手後來居上，反倒以9：7率先聽牌，終場謝淑薇與史翠可娃便以9：11落敗。
雖然落敗，但謝淑薇與史翠可娃仍拿下分組第一，前進4強後，接下來將與另一組分組第二爭奪決賽門票。
──轉自《大紀元》
（責任編輯：葉萍）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/03/a102699284.html
text:
WTA year-end competition Xie Shuwei Jin female double 4 strong

03 Nov 2019, 09:51

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 03, 2019] WTA year-end finals, Taiwanese good friend Xie Shuwei and Czech partner Barbora Strycova on the 1st in the women's doubles group match, 6:2, 4:6, 9: 11 lost to China's Xu Yizhen and Canada's Gabriela Dabrowski, but still ranked first in the group.
Xie Shuwei and Shi Cuikova started the game with a strong momentum. After 3:1 lead, they broke the opponent's serve again at the end of the game and took the next 6:2. The second set of Xie Shuwei and Shi Cuikova suffered a turbulent flow, giving way to the second set at 4:6.


Xie Shuwei, the picture is a photo. (Matthew Stockman/Getty Images)

In the third set, Xie Shuwei and Shi Cuike once achieved a 3:0 lead, but the opponent came up later, but took the lead in 9:7. At the end, Xie Shuwei and Shi Cuikova lost 9:11.
Although defeated, Xie Shuwei and Shi Cuikova still scored the first group. After moving to the top four, they will compete with the other group for the second place.
─Transfer from the Epoch Times
(Editor: Ye Ping)
